name: STN+ Supporter Pass
description:
Ready to show your love for Survive the Nights and help shape its future? The Supporter Pass is your monthly subscription to an ever-expanding collection of cool cosmetic goodies—unique decorations, character flair, and just-for-fun extras. None of these items give you an edge in gameplay; they are all about personalizing your experience and standing out in the crowd.

By staying subscribed, you will continuously gain access to every new addition we roll out. Even better, your support helps fuel ongoing development, ensuring we can keep making the world richer, more stable, and packed with surprises. It is a win-win: you look great, and the game keeps getting better for everyone.

Join the club, enjoy the perks, and know that each month you are helping keep Survive the Nights going strong!

name: Antique Furniture Bundle
description: Add a timeless touch to your home with this large collection of antique furniture and décor items. Perfect for creating a cozy, vintage vibe in your base!

name: Modern Furniture Pack
description: Give your base a fresh, modern makeover with this large collection of sleek furniture and decor items. Perfect for adding style and comfort to your survival base!

name: Fireworks Pack
description: Fireworks aren't just for new years! Enjoy fireworks year round. This bundle includes 3 rocket variants and 1 fireworks cake.

name: Dehydrated Milk
description: Dehydrated milk recipe. Having this item in your Steam Inventory will allow you to craft the item in game.

name: Giant Pumpkin Seeds
description:
